moon_encounter-default.text: (The moon hovers inches above the ground, impossibly suspended in time and space)
(All is calm and quiet as you bask in the moon's cold glow)
(Strangely, you feel the strong urge to say something)

moon_encounter-choice1.text: (For a moment nothing happens. And then...)
INTERESTING. NICE TO MEET YOU, DR PINK. I AM A SPACE ROCK AND DO NOT HAVE A NAME

moon_encounter-choice2.text: (For a moment nothing happens. And then...)

moon_encounter-continue1.text: LIKE YOU, I AM BOUND BY CERTAIN LAWS OF OUR SHARED REALITY. THOSE LAWS COMPEL ME TO COLLIDE WITH YOUR PLANET IN 2.4 MILLISECONDS
IT WILL MEAN MY DEATH, ALONG WITH YOUR PLANET'S AND ITS INHABITANTS
(You stare into the moon; its glow is so bright that it makes your eyes burn)

moon_encounter-continue2.text: I AM A MOON. MY HEART IS NICKEL, MY VEINS ARE ICE. MY CRATERS TELL THE STORY OF WHO I AM AND WHERE I'VE BEEN
I CANNOT FEAR. I CANNOT LOVE. I CANNOT HATE. NOT IN THE SAME WAY YOU CAN, LITTLE HUMAN
I AM INDIFFERENT TO ALL SUFFERING, ACCEPTING OF ALL PAIN. I CANNOT BE ANY OTHER WAY

moon_encounter-choice3.text: YOU DID EXACTLY WHAT YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO DO. YOU COULD NOT HAVE ACTED DIFFERENTLY

moon_encounter-choice4.text: BUT IT IS ALREADY DONE, AS IS ALL OTHER THINGS
THE DEATH OF THE UNIVERSE, THE BIRTH OF EVERYTHING YOU KNOW â€“ ALL ARE HAPPENING, HAVE HAPPENED, WILL HAPPEN
I CANNOT UNDO WHAT HAS ALREADY BEEN DONE. I AM JUST A MOON

moon_encounter-continue3.text: TIME SPENT IN THE PURSUIT OF SOMETHING MEANINGFUL IS NOT TIME WASTED
IT IS TIME FOR ME TO DESTROY YOUR PLANET. GOODBYE
